reviews.review_text: I use the mic for online video recordings and for video calls‚ÄîI bought after someone told me my sound wasn't good‚Äîsince I've been using it, there have been no issues or complaints. It was super easy to change the settings on all the softwares I use as well.

reviews.title: Works good, but
reviews.review_text: Once you get it hooked up, it works really nice but the only problem is getting it hooked up. I had a very horrible time trying to get it to work with my computer after two hours. It finally started working and now it works good. If you're not real computer savvy, I wouldn't buy this. Definitely not for a beginner user.

For some background, I got this microphone to record vocals with an amatuer laptop setup. I loved that I could just plug it right in and use it. The build quality is AMAZING not just because it's only $30; it's heavy and quite sturdy. Dual direction and clear sound quality. Almost too sensitive üòÅ I wish it came with a bag though... I just put it back in the box when I'm not set up though
Very simple and affordable usb mic that was easy to set up and works perfectly fine for recording my college courses.
It's a good microphone. Records voice very well. Created an ABC video for my grandson posted online and sound quality is great.
Great microphone for a good price. I hook it on the back on my PS5. People hear my nice quiet voice.

reviews.title: Good for price
reviews.review_text: Works very well if using an equalizer and/or software that can eliminate background noise and adjust voice settings. It will pick up everything. Echo suppression panels are a must if recording inside.
The audio is good for the price but doesn't work well with a filter/pop filter :/ which i wish i would have known so that I didn't waste so much money on one

reviews.title: Great, but broke after 2 months
reviews.review_text: After two months, it just randomly stopped working. The light on the mute button turned off, my computer didn't detect it. I checked the port on my computer, it was fine, and the wire was completely fine, too. The sound was nice though and the ease of installation was great too.
Microphone decreased sound in chats compared to built in device on my laptop. I wanted improvement and and this was worse.

reviews.title: Excellent microphone for the price!
reviews.review_text: This microphone is very good for the price. I had problems at first because I connected the microphone to a USB hub port. The troubleshooting instructions state that the microphone should be connected directly to the computer. I have an iMac, operating system Sonoma 14.6.1. I used my iPhone charging cord to connect the microphone directly to the computer. This made the microphone work like a champ. This microphone is a very good deal, and it worked very well for narration of a PowerPoint presentation.

reviews.title: Easy to Use and Great Audio Quality
reviews.review_text: My kids and I record content (video and audio) often, but I'd never even thought about or considered an external microphone. This thing is pretty great. The quality of sound is great. I love that it can be mounted to a tripod or set up on a table (horizontal or vertical). We mainly use this on MacOS and I didn't have any issues getting it set up and going. I'd recommend!

reviews.title: don't waste your money

reviews.title: great for the price
reviews.review_text: Works great, minimal background noise. You CAN here if I breathe so it could benefit from a filter, otherwise good.
It's wonderful. Works great, looks good, good price!
i love this microphone.. its cheap but good quality and sounds great
just hard to learn but I did get it in a short time

reviews.title: Good mic
reviews.review_text: Sound quality could be slightly better but it's a nice size and the price is good
Good value for money. Good sound quality and easy to use.

reviews.title: Nice mic works great
reviews.review_text: I have zero experience using an external microphone but I still found this onn microphone to be very easy to set up and use. The instructions that come with it are simple and easy to follow. I like that I can adjust the volume with the knob on the microphone. I love that I can record in two different modes with just the push of a button on the microphone. I also didn't realize how bad the microphone on my laptop was till using this microphone it is seriously a million times better in every single way, the clarity and volume, and over all sound are just way better. I like that I can change the stand on it and also plug headphones directly into the microphone itself. The microphone does have a little weight to it making it feel quality. I also included pictures of it next to a regular twelve ounce bottle of water for size reference. This microphone makes such a huge difference that I really wish I would have used it sooner.

reviews.title: Affordable Quality, Compact Size
reviews.review_text: I just started singing and recording songs, and really like working with this true "plug and play" USB microphone. It's got a nice stable base and a compact size with a very simple setup process. Very versatile with plugins for headphones and a 1/4" hole so you can mount to a mic stand, if you wish. , and then also includes a 1/4" threaded hole for mounting to a stand. Sound quality is comparable to other medium quality mics but with a more much attractive price. I would highly recommend for amateur recording projects!
Doesnt blend into gaming setup. I dont like it so i returned it.
easy pick up and just looks like the picture. Hopefully it will be a good Christmas gift ü§ûüèª

reviews.title: Great podcast microphone for the price.
reviews.review_text: easy to use. be careful where you use it as it does pick up even the slightest of surrounding noise(s).

Bought this as a gift for my son for his gaming computer. A complete waste of money, all of his friends he plays with online kept complaining that his microphone sucked and echoed. He's unhappy and what a embarrassment you get what you pay for.

reviews.title: Great Quality * Easy to Use
reviews.review_text: The onn. USB Recording Microphone with dual recording is a great starter for vloggers / podcasters. Set up was easy peasy which is perfect since I‚Äôm just starting. Included is an instruction manual, and USB connection cable. Plug in and you‚Äôre ready to rock. There‚Äôs an adjustable desk stand to calibrate to your liking. Because the base has a rubber base, it stays stable on the table without toppling over. The sound quality is really nice and clear with minimal to no feedback. I‚Äôve used it for work zoom meetings and for making videos of our family life. It allows me to use on my Windows computer, but it‚Äôs also usable on a Mac. I love that this is affordable with good construction. Really a favorite of mine.

reviews.title: Quality microphone!
reviews.review_text: I am actually a bit surprised by the quality of this USB microphone. I was expecting something lighter, maybe made of plastic, but this is a solid, microphone with a good amount of weight in the metal base. Having this kind of weight allows it to sit on a desk or table without being easily knocked over. Package comes with one microphone, a USB cord, and instructions. The mic, itself, has a headphone jack and USB-C port, and then also includes a 1/4" threaded hole for mounting to a stand. The great thing about this mic is how simple it is to use-- You just plug in and play. It's compatible with Windows, Mac, and Chromebook. Quality of the sound and recording is decent, and the mic has the ability to make cardioid and omnidirectional recording patterns too! Great microphone for recording professional podcasts, vlogs, videos, and voice-overs for gaming!

reviews.title: Great Beginner Studio Mic
reviews.review_text: There was a time a few years ago when the computer mounted microphone was sufficient. Times have changed. I needed an external mic that is able to capture natural sound. Came across this onn. microphone and wanted to give it a try. I got to say I am not disappointed. The clarity is far superior to other USB mics that I have used and light years ahead of the internal PC microphone. I tested the internal against this onn and the results are immediately obvious. Much crisper frequency response on the onn. While the body of the microphone is plastic the unit does have nice weight to it. The plastic construction does not detract from my opinion. It has all the features and functions of a much more expensive microphone. It's got a nice gunmetal gray finish that goes perfectly with any PC. I wasn't expecting much considering the price and I've got to say I am pleasantly surprised! Same quality and function as a much more expensive unit. If you need a studio mic, give this one a try!

reviews.title: Great for beginners
reviews.review_text: So this is a decent microphone for the price point. It was really easy to set up and use. I also like all of the different options that I can do. It looks really nice and the audio is pretty good. If you‚Äôre looking to get into streaming, or any kind of a YouTube link. This is a great starting point. I like that you can use it on multiple things and you can adjust it easily.

reviews.title: We needed this!
reviews.review_text: My 14 year old loves singing and desperately wanted to record herself to post on social media for her family to watch and this microphone has made it possible! Her recordings sound perfect each time! It is so clear that I am amazed she did this in her own room! She was so happy that it was easy to use right out the box and only had to plug it into her laptop. The mic has easy volume and mute controls so she doesn't have to mess with the laptop if she doesn't want to. She also adjusts the height of the microphone as needed! It just sits right on her desk with not in use and is not bulky or anything! Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Best mic for usb c all in one.
reviews.review_text: This is a great mic. Simple plug and play, Detects voice clear from 4 feet away, and way more. Just buy comparable mics are $80-$100. Bought an expensive setup with sound car turned out to be pos. This on mic however has exceed my expectations and ongoing.

reviews.title: Loud and good quality
reviews.review_text: The microphone offers exceptional performance without a hefty price tag. Its impressive sound capture abilities make it perfect for recording vocals, instruments, and podcasts with clarity and precision. The sleek design adds a touch of sophistication to any setup, while the user-friendly interface ensures smooth operation. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, the microphone delivers top-notch quality at an affordable price, proving that you don't need to break the bank for excellence.

reviews.title: Perfect for my setup
reviews.review_text: I purchased this mic for gaming and for making videos on YouTube, making podcasts, recording music. You can confidently place this mic in any position, or angle, and it will pick up your voice clearly. I am always on my pc either gaming, streaming, classes, etc. This is the best microphone I‚Äôve had so far.

reviews.title: Great value!
reviews.review_text: This mic is simple to use. I love plug and play hardware, and this is no exception. Setup is simple. The quality is amazing. This is perfect for podcasts, voiceovers, or streaming. The sound is crystal clear and crisp. This is a great value for the price point.

reviews.title: Great microphone
reviews.review_text: My daughter's and I do personal podcasts for the family and this microphone is a game changer. We've had some issues with incoherency using the computer speakers and this has completely changed that and it really picks up all of us well. It's easy to use as well!

reviews.title: Easy to use, great for beginners!
reviews.review_text: I like the sleek professional look and the quality of this Onn. USB Microphone made for recording vlogs and podcasts, gaming, video calls and more. It‚Äôs easy to set up and use, no need to mess with difficult lengthy installation processes but a quick and straightforward plug and play feature, simply connect the usb cable to your computer and you‚Äôre all set and ready to start. The sound quality is surprisingly good and very clear. I like the 6 feet long cable and easy access volume and mute controls located directly and conveniently at the front of the device. The microphone is also light and portable. The attached desk stand has a swivel feature to easily adjust it to the angle needed. On the backside you find a 1/4‚Äù mic stand thread, a USB-C to usb power port, a headphone jack, as well as the choice of the microphone pickup pattern that lets you choose between omnidirectional or cardioid patterns. I would definitely recommend this recording microphone!

I was broadcasting from home while recovering from illness when my pro gear went bad. This was a quick affordable fix that I could have delivered to my home within hours. It was easy to set up, plug-in-play, and after some minor volume adjustments worked well enough to get me through a few days.

reviews.title: Good microphone for the price
reviews.review_text: Surprisingly good, cheap desktop microphone. It may not be the greatest microphone ever, but it's definitely good for the price and includes a bevy of features including the ability to mount it, manual gain control, and an audio output device for headphones.

reviews.title: versatile and easy-to-use microphone for all use
reviews.review_text: We have several other products by this manufacturer and have always been happy with their products. So this microphone is no exception. It is an excellent choice for anyone who wants to record high-quality audio with a versatile and easy-to-use microphone. This microphone has two recording patterns - cardioid and omnidirectional - which makes it ideal for a wide range of recording scenarios. The cardioid recording pattern is perfect for recording sound from a single source, such as a person speaking directly into the microphone. On several runs it perfectly picks up sound from the front of the microphone and rejects sound from the sides and rear, which helps to reduce background noise and improve the clarity of the recorded audio. Excellent for anyone dabbling into podcasting etc. The omnidirectional recording pattern, on the other hand, is ideal for recording sound from multiple sources or for capturing ambient sound. It picks up sound from all directions, which makes it perfect for recording group conversations, musical performances, or environmental sounds. One of the best things about this microphone is pretty easy and straight forward to use. It connects to your laptop via a USB cable and requires no additional drivers or software. Simply plug it in, select the recording pattern you want to use, and start recording. We have not used it with any other devices such as tablets or if it integrates with a phone as seamlessly as with our laptop. But given how nicely it has been made, we imagine it would be a simple process there, too. In terms of sound quality, this microphone delivers excellent results. Perfect for our house needs recording kids videos and all. It seems to be able to handle professional grade recording just fine as well. Pretty decent signal-to-noise ratio, which helps to reduce background noise and improve the clarity of the recorded audio. So, overall, we would highly recommend this microphone to anyone who needs a versatile and easy-to-use recoding device for high-quality audio. Whether you're a podcaster, musician, video creator, or simply use it for family needs (as we do) this microphone is sure to deliver excellent results.

reviews.title: Better than you probably expected
reviews.review_text: This little microphone is pretty impressive. Cardioid and omnidirectional mode options provide great sound options for podcasts or general voice recording. It's heavier than it looks and even though it's plastic, it doesn't feel or look like a budget friendly microphone. I wanted to try it out and expected to go through some song and dance click fest with warnings and software download prompts, but I got none of that with this on an iMac. On a side note, you may or may not have to set your audio input in the settings if you want to keep it attached and set as default. The USB to USB-C cord is plenty long and feels very durable. On the back of the microphone you have options. You can attach headphones using standard 3.5 mm jack. There's also the option to switch between cardioid or omnidirectional audio. Cardioid mode picks up sounds that are coming from a more precise direction (straight ahead) and omnidirectional picks up all sounds from all directions. There's also an option to attach the microphone to a tripod or hang it to prevent tipping or knocking it over if it's on a desk or table. The button on the front has two colors to let you know when it's muted or actively recording. Blue is recording, red is muted. This is useful in two ways. You can be assured you're not getting any unwanted sounds and also allows for another person to use their own microphone without anyone shifting places or weird scratching sounds while adjusting or moving the microphone. I have thought about doing a podcast in the past and now I know that if I decide to follow through with it, I have the most important piece of equipment in order to do it! Very cool little mic!

reviews.title: Nice mic for gaming or podcasts
reviews.review_text: Received this item and couldn‚Äôt wait to hook it up and try it out. Has a great feel to it and is a very attractive mic. The stand is adjustable which is a must. It is compatible with windows, mac and chromebook. USB hook up and a headphone jack make this item useful for everyone in one way or another. Turning the volume up or down on the mic is a breeze and it has a handy dandy power indicator light. My son has it connected to his computer for gaming and he really likes it. His friends online say they hear him loud and clear without any distortion. A good product from the onn company.
